jobTitle: Machine Learning Scientist With Audio DSP Background
jobDescription: MACHINE LEARNINGMACHINE LEARNING SCIENTIST WITH AUDIO DSP BACKGROUNDObEN’s mission is to enable everyone in the world to create their own Personal AI (PAI), intelligent 3D avatars that look, sound, and behave like the individual user.
